prompts: Create a mythical creature Pokemon with green scales and a majestic wingspan.
Design a dragon-type Pokemon that embodies earth's natural elements and has a unique shape.
Show me a legendary Pokemon that features a combination of blue and black colors.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon that blends aquatic and terrestrial traits for versatility.
Generate an intricate design for a Pokemon known for its stealth and strategic abilities.
Make a Pokemon that has a fierce appearance with sharp edges and a sleek body.
Give me a Pokemon that balances elegance and strength in both appearance and abilities.
